TopicTitle: Kerbal Space Program Career: Spaceplane to Laythe... Eventually.

Articles.Content:
I'm back... In an episode I managed to lose (screw up is more like it), Jeb, Bill and Bob got stuck in orbit around Jool, out of fuel, we now start working on a space plane.

Yes we are going to bring a space plane to Laythe, one of Jools moons. Or is it "Muns"? hm! But first we need to build and test it.

<span style="color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: Roboto, arial, sans-serif; line-height: 17px; background-color: rgb(246, 246, 246);">
